Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
app.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
Handles management features in the application such as employee management and drink price updates.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController()

  • Method Details

    • setConnection

      public void setConnection(Connection conn)
      Sets the database connection.

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the main application stage for the controller.
      Parameters:
      stage - The object representing the primary application window.

    • runSqlFile

      public String runSqlFile(Connection conn, String filePath)
      Executes an SQL script stored in a file and returns the output as a string. Query results are formatted into a text block for easy display.
      Parameters:
      conn - The Connection object used to execute the SQL statement.
      filePath - The path to the SQL file to execute.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted query results or update confirmation.

    • showEmployees

      private void showEmployees()
      Displays all employees from the database in the text area, ordered by role. Each employee’s role, first name, and last name are displayed in descending order of role.

    • addEmployee

      private void addEmployee()
      Adds a new employee to the database using data from the text fields. After successful insertion, all input fields are cleared.

    • dropEmployee

      private void dropEmployee()
      Deletes an employee record from the database using the provided email. If the deletion is successful, the field background turns green; otherwise, it turns red.

    • onDrinkSelect

      private void onDrinkSelect()
      Fetches the current base price of the selected drink and displays it.

    • updatePrice

      private void updatePrice()
      Updates the price of the selected drink in the database. The new price is validated and updated in the drinks table. The text field displays whether the update was successful.
